job_title: Product Manager/Program Manager – Contractual and Commercial Expertise

primary: Experience in Print or Personal Systems
Ability to Work in Cross-Cultural Teams
all: Experience in Print or Personal Systems
Ability to Work in Cross-Cultural Teams

jd: From: Kranthi, Propelsys kranthi@propelsys.com Reply to: kranthi@propelsys.com Full Time Opportunity Job Title: Product Manager/Program Manager – Contractual and Commercial Expertise Location: US (Houston/Austin On site from day 1) Start: Immediately GC USC H4 EAD GC EAD Exp: 6-10 Years - Required Skills: · Program/Project Management: 3-7 years of experience in product or program management roles. · Contractual/Commercial Space Knowledge: Experience or familiarity with contractual or commercial processes (pricing, quoting, etc.). · Strong Communication Skills: Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders, driving clarity and consensus. · Team Leadership: Proven ability to bring together diverse teams and align them towards common goals. · Tools Expertise: Proficient in using JIRA for managing epics, features, and user stories. Familiarity with Signavio or other process mapping tools is a plus. · Agile Methodologies: Comfortable working in Agile environments, managing backlogs, and ensuring successful execution. Preferred Qualifications: · Location Flexibility: Houston or Austin-based candidates preferred, but open to remote work with a focus on Europe and US time zones. · Experience in Print or Personal Systems: Experience in the print or personal systems space would be beneficial but not required. · JIRA Expertise: Strong familiarity with JIRA for project management, especially managing features and overseeing execution. · Ability to Work in Cross-Cultural Teams: Experience working with teams across the US, EMEA, and India for delivery and execution.
